item.title: About me
item.author: aveek.s98@gmail.com (Aveek Saha)
item.description: I’m a Computer Science Engineering student and I am passionate about Full stack development, Machine Learning and Cloud Computing. I also work on IoT projects and I’m handy with microcontrollers. I love swimming and drawing as well. Be sure to check out some of my artwork. You can find out more about the things I make on my Portfolio
